node.excerpt: Most of us write tests these days. Whether they are unit, integration, end-to-end or performance tests once written we often do not go back to them until they fail. It is thus vital to have a clear assertion message when a test fails.  Hamcrest I think Hamcrest is the most popular assertion library available in Javaâ€¦

frontmatter.title: Use ShouldKO for better assertion messages
